page.title: 04FARMING IN THE DISTRICT
page.content: In the area around{Weeley Heath}much of the land is arable. We visited three farms which we hoped would provide a variety of different styles of farming. The first farm was Ken Muir's Honeypot Fruit Farm, the second was Rowheath Farm (arable), and the third was{Ampers Wick Farm}(beef). Honeypot Fruit Farm has existed for around thirty years and has around fifteen acres of land which is mainly used for{strawberries}and other soft fruit. They import from the continent around 80% of all the new varieties of strawberries. They test them on the farm. They also supply{house plants}to shops such as Marks and Spencer and Sainsbury's.
